Posts.Content: adassarose Just when you think you can move forward, something else comes along to knock you off your feet.  I have been through surgery and radiotherapy now they tell me I have to have a hysteroscopy because I had some spotting a few weeks ago. You cannot help thinking the worst while hoping for the best. I want to say you will be ok. I have gone through the same as you but the opposite way round. Found I had cancer of the uterus and had everything removed. Got the all clear, then two weeks latter told I had breast cancer, waiting on lumpectomy and radiotherapy  What the out come, keep your chin up. Think positive and I'm here if you need anyone
Posts.Title: hysteroscopy
